column2: imagine eating mashed potatoes by itself
column3: without gravy. Got that bland taste in your mouth? Ok
column4: now wrap the mashed potatoes in a layer of tempura batter and fry it. Now how is it? The same
column5: right? The tempura really didn't add much. They serve it on a tray with some sauces drawn out so you can do that
column6: but it's not really that good. I'd consider this a side-grade to regular ol' mashed potatoes. Quick Tip
column8: it's decent if you put crab dip on top of it. It lends some of the salt and flavors to it.
